actions.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.
Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 271.

official_title: A bill to provide for one additional Federal judge for the middle district of Louisiana and one less Federal judge for the eastern district of Louisiana.

summary.text: Amends the Federal judicial code to provide for one additional Federal judge for the middle district, and one less judge for the eastern district, of Louisiana.

titles.title: A bill to provide for one additional Federal judge for the middle district of Louisiana and one less Federal judge for the eastern district of Louisiana.
